text: Suyang station (; Fuzhounese: ) is a metro station on Line 2 of the Fuzhou Metro in Suyang Village, Minhou County, Fuzhou. It is the current western terminus on the line and located on the east of Zhuqi Depot, a depot of the line, and the north of G316 highway. It was opened on April 26, 2019. ==Station layout== Suyang station consists one island platform on the basement and a concourse on the ground. {| border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="3" | style="border-top:solid 1px gray;" width="80" valign="top" |2F | style="border-top:solid 1px gray;" width="100" valign="top" |Reserved | style="border-top:solid 1px gray;" width="410" valign="top" | |- | style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray; border-top:solid 1px gray;" valign="top" width="50" |G | style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray; border-top:solid 1px gray;" valign="top" width="100" |Concourse | style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray; border-top:solid 1px gray;" valign="top" width="390" |Exits, Ticketing, Automatic Ticketing Machines |- | rowspan="3" style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" valign="top" |L1 Platforms |20px |← termination track (alighting passengers only) |- | colspan="2" style="border-right:solid 2px black;border-left:solid 2px black;border-top:solid 2px black;border-bottom:solid 2px black;text- align:center;"|Island platform, doors will open on the left |- | style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" |20px | style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" |→ towards Yangli (Shadi)→ |- |} Source: == References ==
